net.sourceforge.jnipp.project
Class Project

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.jnipp.project.Project
public class Project
extends java.lang.Object

Root class for project settings. Each instance of this class represents the settings for a particular project. An instance is created by the Main class where it is used to read in a project file. An instance is also created by the GUI when creating a new or reading an existing project file.

Version:
$Revision: 1.11 $
Author:
$Author: ptrewhella $
See Also:
Main, App

load

public void load(java.lang.String fileName)
          throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                 java.io.IOException,
                 org.w3c.dom.DOMException,
                 ProjectFormatException
Load a project from a file. This method is utilized to load and initialize this Project instance with the data contained in the specified project file. The project file is in an XML format with defined tags for the various project attributes.
Parameters:
fileName - Name of project file to be loaded.
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException -  
java.io.IOException -  
org.w3c.dom.DOMException -  
ProjectFormatException -  

save

public void save(java.lang.String fileName)
          throws java.io.IOException
Save a project to a file. This method is utilized to save the project settings to the file whose name is specified as parameter. All of the data is stored in a defined XML format with defined tags for the various project attributes.
Parameters:
fileName - Name of project file to be loaded.
Throws:
java.io.IOException -
